Slash and churn: Water polo back up and running in Gisborne after 60 years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/sport/slash-and-churn-water-polo-back-up-and-running-in-gisborne-after-60-years/CEECVXPSARFV3BN7B2XIHVSKWY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/sport/slash-and-churn-water-polo-back-up-and-running-in-gisborne-after-60-years/CEECVXPSARFV3BN7B2XIHVSKWY/ John GilliesFormer Hungarian professional Boros is helping to drive the sport's revival in Gisborne. Fri, 15 Nov 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Water polo has made a return in Gisborne after a lengthy break. Members of the Tairāwhiti Slash squad are, back row (from left): Kellann Kemp, Macario Mangiacaballi, Zoli Boros and Andrew Ing. Middle row 1: Chris Lunny, Jose Castano and Crystal Barnard. Middle row 2: William Henstock, Roxy Adams and Daniel Grabenheinrich. Front: James Starnes and George Longhurst.
